column2: "Na iyi ekyir no ɔbaa dɛ David kaa Filistiafo no gya
column3: na ɔbrɛɛ hɔn adze: na David gyee Filistiafo nsamu ahenkurow no do tumdzi no."
na ɔdze susuhoma susuu hɔn ma wɔdedaa famu; na ebiasa biara a osusui no wokum hɔn mu ebien
column4: na hɔn mu nkyɛmu kor na ɔmaa wɔtsenaa ase. Na Moabfo nkaa no bɛyɛɛ nkowaa maa David
aber a osii mu kɔr dɛ ɔrokɔhwehwɛ n'ahendzi ekyir kwan wɔ Esutsen Eufrates no ho no mu."

column2: "Na David kyeer no dɔm mu mpɔnkɔdofo apem ahaesuon
column3: na anamɔnmufo mpemeduonu: na David twitwaa tseaseanam mpɔnkɔ no nyinara hɔn anantsir ntsin na ogyaa hɔn mu ntseaseanam ɔha ho dze."

column2: "Na aber a Damaskɔs Siriafo no baa dɛ wɔrobɔboa Zobahen Hadadezer no
column3: David kum Siriafo no mu nyimpa mpemeduonu ebien."

column2: "Nna David dze bansifo kɛtsenaa Damaskɔs Siria: na Siriafo no bɛyɛɛ nkowaa maa David
column3: na wɔdze ayɛyɛdze bae. Na EWURADZE maa David konyimdzi wɔ beebiara mbrɛ ɔkɔree."

column2: "Na David gyegyee sika akyɛm a ɔwowɔ Hadadezer no nkowaa ho no
"Na Hadadezer no nkurow Beta na Berothai mu na ɔhen David faa boran mbordo."
"Na aber a Hamathen Toi tsee dɛ David aka Hadadezer no dɔm nyinara gya no
column4: "Toi somaa ne ba Joram ma ɔbaa ɔhen David nkyɛn bekyiaa no
column7: na ɔaka no gya ntsi: osiandɛ Hadadezer nye Toi dzii ako. Na Joram dze dwetɛ ndzɛmba

column2: "iyinom so na ɔhen David tui sii nkyɛn maa EWURADZE
column3: dze kaa dwetɛ na sika a ofi amanaman nyinara a ɔbrɛɛ hɔn adze no mu no mu a otui sii nkyɛn no ho;"

column2: "Na aber a David sanee fii ne Siriafo kum no mu wɔ Nkyen Bɔnsa no mu no
"Na ɔdze bansifo tsenaa Edom: Edom mu nyinara na ɔdze bansifo tsenatsenae
column3: na Edomfo nyinara bɛyɛɛ nkowaa maa David. Na EWURADZE maa David konyimdzi wɔ beebiara mbrɛ ɔkɔree."

column2: "Na David dzii hen wɔ Israel nyinara do; na David dzii atsɛmbu na tseneneesɛm maa ne man nyinara."
"Nna Zeruia ba Joab na ɔhwɛ dɔm no do; na Ahilud ba Jehosafat nye ɔsɛnkafo:"

column3: na Abiathar ba Ahimelek nye asɔfo; na Seraia nye ɔkyerɛwfo;"

column2: "na Jehoiada ba Benaia na ɔhwɛ Keretifo na Peletifo  no do; na David mba no na wɔyɛ asɔfo."
column3: "#8.18 KERETIFO na PELETIFO: Iyinom yɛ nsordaafo a wɔbɔ hɔn paa dzi dwuma bi."
